function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 due to lack of effective public health response","Impact":"Increased transmission and casualties from COVID-19","Mitigation":"Utilize digital technologies for contact tracing and monitoring","Technologies":"IoT, AI, Blockchain, 5G","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Potential security and privacy risks in the use of digital technologies","Impact":"Data breaches, unauthorized access to personal health information","Mitigation":"Implement robust cybersecurity measures, encryption, and privacy protocols","Technologies":"IoT, AI, Blockchain, 5G","People":"General public, healthcare providers","Owner":"Technology companies, government regulatory bodies"}]}
